title: The Wrong Side of Midnight
description: Chloe Burlington has a heart bigger than her bank account. Wealth and status meant nothing. She would gladly give up her money for the chance to be loved, especially by the sexy roofer.Matthew Sharp wants nothing to do women, especially the little blonde by the pool who never had to work a day in her life. He'd stay far away from that one.Chloe was determined to meet him. A few little lies later, and Matthew had fallen in love.He just couldn't find out she was the rich girl he hated.When Matthew lets her into his life, she finds a way to use her moneyâ€¦Being an heiress in the Detroit projects was easy.Maintaining her lies was impossible.
author: Terri  Marie
